verses.verse: And Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Leah <WH3812>, whom she bare <WH3205> unto Jacob <WH3290>, went out <WH3318> to see <WH7200> the daughters <WH1323> of the land <WH776>.

And Shechem <WH7927> the son <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the Hivite <WH2340>, the prince <WH5387> of the land <WH776>, saw <WH7200> her <WH3947>; and he took her <WH7901>, and lay with her <WH6031>, and humbled her.

And his soul <WH5315> clave <WH1692> unto Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Jacob <WH3290>, and he loved <WH157> the damsel <WH5291>, and spake <WH1696> kindly <WH3820> unto the damsel <WH5291>.
And Shechem <WH7927> spake <WH559> unto his father <WH1> Hamor <WH2544>, saying <WH559>, Get <WH3947> me this damsel <WH3207> to wife <WH802>.

Now Jacob <WH3290> heard <WH8085> that he had defiled <WH2930> Dinah <WH1783> his daughter <WH1323>; and his sons <WH1121> were with his cattle <WH4735> in the field <WH7704>: and Jacob <WH3290> held his peace <WH2790> until they came <WH935>.
And Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> went out <WH3318> unto Jacob <WH3290> to commune <WH1696> with him <WH854>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> in from the field <WH7704> when they heard <WH8085> it <WH582>: and the men were grieved <WH6087>, and they were very <WH3966> wroth <WH2734>, because he had wrought <WH6213> folly <WH5039> in Israel <WH3478> in lying <WH7901> with Jacob <WH3290>'s daughter <WH1323>; which thing ought not to be done <WH6213>.

And Hamor <WH2544> communed <WH1696> with them <WH559>, saying, The soul <WH5315> of my son <WH1121> Shechem <WH7927> longeth <WH2836> for your daughter <WH1323>: I pray you <WH5414>, give her unto him to wife <WH802>.
And make ye marriages <WH2859> with us <WH5414>; give your daughters <WH1323> unto us <WH3947>, and take our daughters unto you <WH1323>.
And ye shall dwell <WH3427> with us <WH776>: and the land shall be <WH1961> before you <WH6440>; dwell <WH3427> and trade <WH5503> ye therein <WH270>, and get you possessions therein.

And Shechem <WH7927> said <WH559> unto her father <WH1> and unto her brethren <WH251>, Let me find <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in your eyes <WH5869>, and what ye shall say <WH559> unto me I will give <WH5414>.
Ask <WH7235> me never so much <WH3966> dowry <WH4119> and gift <WH4976>, and I will give <WH5414> according as ye shall say <WH559> unto me <WH5414>: but give me the damsel <WH5291> to wife <WH802>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> answered <WH6030> Shechem <WH7927> and Hamor <WH2544> his father <WH1> with guile <WH4820>, and spake <WH1696>, because he had defiled <WH2930> Dinah <WH1783> their sister <WH269>,

and said <WH559> unto them <WH3808>, We cannot do <WH6213> this thing <WH1697>, to give <WH5414> our sister <WH269> to one <WH376> that is uncircumcised <WH6190>; for that were a reproach unto us <WH2781>.
Only on this <WH2063> condition will we consent <WH225> unto you <WH2145>: if ye will be as we are, that every male of you be circumcised <WH4135>;

then will we give <WH5414> our daughters <WH1323> unto you <WH3947>, and we will take your daughters <WH1323> to us <WH3427>, and we will dwell with you <WH259>, and we will become one people <WH5971>.
But if ye will not hearken <WH8085> unto us <WH4135>, to be circumcised; then will we take <WH3947> our daughter <WH1323>, and we will be gone <WH1980>.
And their words <WH1697> pleased <WH3190> Hamor <WH2544>, and Shechem <WH7927> Hamor <WH2544>'s son <WH1121>.

And the young man <WH5288> deferred <WH309> not to do <WH6213> the thing <WH1697>, because he had delight <WH2654> in Jacob <WH3290>'s daughter <WH1323>: and he was honored <WH3513> above all the house <WH1004> of his father <WH1>.
And Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> came <WH935> unto the gate <WH8179> of their city <WH5892>, and communed <WH1696> with the men <WH582> of their city <WH5892>, saying <WH559>,

These men <WH582> are peaceable <WH8003> with <WH854> us <WH3427>; therefore let them dwell in the land <WH776>, and trade <WH5503> therein <WH776>; for, behold, the land is large <WH7342> enough <WH3027> for them <WH6440>; let us take <WH3947> their daughters <WH1323> to us for wives <WH802>, and let us give <WH5414> them our daughters <WH1323>.

Only on this condition <WH2063> will the men <WH582> consent <WH225> unto us to dwell <WH3427> with us <WH259>, to become one people <WH5971>, if every male <WH2145> among us be circumcised <WH4135>, as they are circumcised <WH4135>.
Shall not their cattle <WH4735> and their substance <WH7075> and all their beasts <WH929> be ours <WH225>? only let us consent unto them <WH3427>, and they will dwell with us.

And unto Hamor <WH2544> and unto Shechem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> hearkened <WH8085> all that went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city <WH5892>; and every male <WH2145> was circumcised <WH4135>, all that went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city <WH5892>.

And it came to pass on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, when they were sore <WH3510>, that two <WH8147> of the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>, Simeon <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878>, Dinah <WH1783>'s brethren <WH251>, took <WH3947> each man <WH376> his sword <WH2719>, and came <WH935> upon the city <WH5892> unawares <WH983>, and slew <WH2026> all the males <WH2145>.

And they slew <WH2026> Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and took <WH3947> Dinah <WH1783> out <WH3318> of Shechem <WH7927>'s house <WH1004>, and went forth <WH3318>.
The sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> upon the slain <WH2491>, and plundered <WH962> the city <WH5892>, because they had defiled <WH2930> their sister <WH269>.
They took <WH3947> their flocks <WH6629> and their herds <WH1241> and their asses <WH2543>, and that which was in the city <WH5892>, and that which was in the field <WH7704>;
and all their wealth <WH2428>, and all their little ones <WH2945> and their wives <WH802>, took they captive <WH7617> and made a prey <WH962>, even all that was in the house <WH1004>.

And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to Simeon <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878>, Ye have troubled <WH5916> me <WH3427>, to make me odious to the inhabitants of the land <WH776>, among the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522>: and <WH4962>, I being few in number <WH4557>, they will gather themselves together <WH622> against me <WH5221> and smite me <WH5221>; and I shall be destroyed <WH8045>, I and my house <WH1004>.
And they said <WH559>, Should he deal <WH6213> with our sister <WH269> as with a harlot <WH2181>?
